#summary Frequently asked questions about contributing to Piccolo2D
#labels FAQ

= Introduction =

This FAQ is designed to help current or prospective developers understand more about how the Piccolo2D project is run.

= Frequently Asked Questions =

|| *How do I become a developer?* ||

 Non-developers become developers by contributing issues/patches/wiki content/group discussion and receiving at least two positive votes and no negative votes from existing developers.

|| *What are the requirements prior to checking in?* ||

 All check-ins must be accompanied with an issue # in the commit message and pass all unit tests.
